name: iwilfin

indications.text: iwilfin ( eflornithine ) indicated reduce risk relapse adult pediatric patients high-risk neuroblastoma ( hrnb ) demonstrated least partial response prior multiagent , multimodality therapy including anti-gd2 immunotherapy .

contraindications.text: prior initiation iwilfin , perform baseline audiogram , complete blood count , liver function tests . ( 2.1 , 5.3 ) recommended iwilfin based body surface area ( table 1 ) . ( 2.2 ) iwilfin taken orally twice daily without food disease progression , unacceptable toxicity , maximum two years . ( 2.2 ) iwilfin tablets may swallowed whole , chewed , crushed mixed soft food liquid . ( 2.5 )

warningsAndPrecautions: iwilfin ( eflornithine ) available 192 mg round , white off-white tablets imprinted efl one side 192 side ; approximately 11 mm diameter supplied follows : bottle 100 tablets containing desiccant , ndc 78670-150-01
indications_original: IWILFIN (eflornithine) is indicated to reduce the risk of relapse in adult and pediatric patients with high-risk neuroblastoma (HRNB) who have demonstrated at least a partial response to prior multiagent, multimodality therapy including anti-GD2 immunotherapy.
contraindications_original: Prior to initiation of IWILFIN, perform baseline audiogram, complete blood count, and liver function tests. ( 2.1 , 5.3 ) Recommended dosage of IWILFIN is based on body surface area (see Table 1 ). ( 2.2 ) IWILFIN is taken orally twice daily with or without food until disease progression, unacceptable toxicity, or for a maximum of two years. ( 2.2 ) IWILFIN tablets may be swallowed whole, chewed, or crushed and mixed with soft food or liquid. ( 2.5 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
IWILFIN (eflornithine) is available as 192 mg round, white to off-white tablets imprinted with EFL on one side and 192 on the other side; approximately 11 mm in diameter and supplied as follows:
                  
                     Bottle of 100 tablets containing desiccant, NDC 78670-150-01
